Conference Overview

The International Conference on Virtual Reality Continuum and its Applications (VRCAI) is an ACM SIGGRAPH-sponsored conference focusing on cutting-edge innovations in virtual reality, augmented reality, mixed reality, and artificial intelligence. Since its inception in 2002, VRCAI has become an important platform for global virtual reality researchers, practitioners, and artists.

VRCAI 2025 will be held from December 13-14 in Macau, China, hosted by the Macau University of Science and Technology. The conference will bring together world-class experts and scholars for in-depth exchanges and discussions on the latest developments and applications of virtual reality continuum technologies.

We cordially invite you to submit original research papers, demonstrations, artworks, and to participate in this conference!

Conference Theme

VRCAI 2025

Reality Fusion: Virtual Reality in the Era of Metaverse and Artificial Intelligence

With the rise of the metaverse concept and the rapid development of artificial intelligence technologies, the Virtual Reality Continuum is facing unprecedented opportunities and challenges. VRCAI 2025 will focus on the core theme of "Reality Fusion," exploring how to drive innovation and application of virtual reality technologies in the era of metaverse and artificial intelligence.

This conference will particularly focus on the deep integration of artificial intelligence and virtual reality, including AI-driven content creation, intelligent interaction, and personalized immersive experiences. Through bringing together the wisdom of global researchers, we hope to jointly explore the increasingly blurred boundaries between virtual and reality, and promote the in-depth application of virtual reality continuum technologies in research, industry, and art.

WorkShop

Session on Digital Heritage in the Age of AI and the Metaverse

Digital heritage is undergoing a seismic transformation. The convergence of Artificial Intelligence (AI), immersive technologies (VR/AR/MR/XR), game engines, generative models, and interactive 3D environments has redefined how we capture, reconstruct, preserve, interpret, and engage with cultural heritage. With the rise of large language models (LLMs), multimodal AI, and the conceptual expansion of the Metaverse, we are witnessing not only technological evolution but also the reshaping of cultural memory, storytelling, and heritage interpretation.

Topic Session Invited by Industry

NVIDIA added a topic session (1 hour) which will run immediately after the Session on Digital Heritage. It will be special presentations + Q&A. This is a great opportunity to communicate with the cutting-edge of the industry

Co-host: Dr. Charles Cheung, Deputy Director, NVIDIA AI Technology Center Hong Kong, NVIDIA Corporation. AND Cliff Ho, Senior Solution Architect & Omniverse Lead, NVIDIA AI Technology Center Hong Kong, NVIDIA Corporation

Conference Venue

ACM SIGGRAPH VRCAI 2025 will be held at Macau University of Science and Technology (MUST), located in Taipa, Macau, China.

Macau University of Science and Technology (MUST)

Address: Avenida Wai Long, Taipa, Macau, China

Building: Block O, Academic Building

GPS Coordinates: 22.1559° N, 113.5673° E

Transportation: The university is approximately 15 minutes from Macau International Airport and easily accessible by taxi, bus, or shuttle services.

For more details about the venue, accommodation options, and transportation, please visit our Venue page.
